about_the_game:
My Daily Pets invites you to experience a special adventure that combines simulation and storytelling. Dive into the world of alien pets as you discover their mysterious origins and build a unique bond with them.

WHAT'S THE GAME ABOUT?

Extraordinary creatures have arrived as a gift from the universe, and it’s up to you to take care of them and learn all about their fascinating traits. As a galactic researcher, your tasks include:

  • Feeding, playing, and caring for your pets to keep them happy and healthy.

  • Training them to learn new tricks and abilities—even dancing!

  • Uncovering their unique stories and documenting them in your Research Journal.

  • Personalizing their environments and unlocking special items and abilities.

WHAT DO YOU NEED TO DO?

Your mission is clear: become the best alien pet researcher. To succeed, you’ll need to keep their status bars balanced:

  • Happiness: Increase your pet’s affection by playing or petting them.

  • Sleep: Ensure they rest to regain energy.

  • Hunger and Hydration: Feed and hydrate your pet to keep them healthy.

  • Health: Monitor their overall well-being and care for them if they get sick.

For now, you can take care of just one pet at a time, but in the future, you’ll be able to manage up to three simultaneously. As your pet levels up, you’ll unlock new abilities, toys, and exciting discoveries about their species. Each alien pet has a unique story to unravel, which you’ll record in your Research Journal, documenting everything you learn about them.

UNIQUE CUSTOMIZABLE SPECIES

Create and personalize your very own alien pet. Choose from four unique species, each originating from a different world with its own personality and style. Design its appearance with different ears, legs, heads, and a wide variety of colors. Make your pet as unique as you are!

KEY FEATURES

  • Four unique species: Each with its own personality and style.

  • Deep simulation: Feed, hydrate, play, and care for your pets.

  • Immersive narrative: Uncover the mysterious origins of these creatures and their stories.

  • Fun training system: Teach your pet tricks, gestures, and even dance moves.

  • Exploration and discovery: Complete your Research Journal with data and secrets about each species.

  • Real-time gameplay: Experience the game in sync with real-life time, including day, afternoon and night cycles.

THERE ADORABLE CREATURES CAN'T WAIT TO MEET YOU!

Discover the magic of caring for your own alien pets and become a master researcher. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: My Daily Pets

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8 (32 or 64 bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: My Daily Pets is a game where you care for alien pets and uncover their secrets. Feed them, play, train, and dance. Investigate their origins, document findings, and bond with these adorable extraterrestrial companions!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, French*, Italian*, German*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Catalan*
*languages with full audio support
